originalText.text: Dr Pape, is the best eye doctor I have  ever went to in my life. Great Specialist nobody does it better. A wonderful person as well. Dr Pape, is old school,  spends lots of time with patient explains in detail your examination answers any concerns you might have. Is a master at his craft. I moved out of state a couple of years ago . It’s a giant loss to me and my wife not being able to be under his care anymore. Dr Pape, you are awesome!  From Steve and Meryem

originalText.text: Awful experience today, schedule an appointment with Dr Pape last week, arrived 30 min before my scheduled appointment  to check in. After sitting in the waiting room for an hour (which is all antique style / old and creepy to say the least) I went to the receptionist (who was coughing the whole time) to ask what's going on, how much longer should I expect to wait, she told me it's going to be a while, doctor is behind schedule. So why offer appointment you can't hold?? wasted so much time and money trying to get to your office only for you guys to not hold up your end up the of the bargain. I definitely should've just walked out when I saw the interior of your waiting room.

originalText.text:
I have never encountered another doctor like Dr. Pape.  Not only is he incredibly knowledgeable—a true expert in his field—but he is also a kind, gentle, caring doctor.
In office, he does not rush you through.  He patiently answers all of your questions.  If you call to speak to him, he always calls back the same day.  If you have a problem, he does everything in his power to help solve it.
He would be the clone I would use for all doctors.
Dorothy O’Sullivan

originalText.text:
Dr. Pape is incredible. He's not only the best eye doctor, but the best healthcare professional I've encountered in the last few years. He 's extremely detail oriented, so he takes his time to take extensive notes, diagnose, and explain everything so that you understand what you exactly need to get better.
I was slightly annoyed because I waited 30 minutes past my appointment, but I quickly realized that it's because Dr. Pape really goes above and beyond to help you get better. There are other specialists that I've paid similar amount for the most unsatisfying, ambiguous, rushed diagnosis. Dr. Pape really cares about the patient and dedicated to his professions.

originalText.text:
Five-star can't fully describe what a doctor Dr. Pape is. I'm a patient with many eye problems, dry eye, high myopia, floaters, etc, so I've seen a lot of ophthalmologists and optometrists. Trust me, Dr. Pape is the best!
When I first visited Dr. Pape, he spent 3 hours with me listening to my concerns and giving me thorough tests. He double tested my eye pressure and the back of my eyes to make sure nothing went wrong. He would write down all my conditions/concerns so that he would know what to do for the next visit. He answered all my questions with great patience. My second time with him was the same. When he looked at my profile he knew everything about me. Maybe you need to wait a bit sometime, but what he provides is worth waiting for. He is the most responsible, caring, and patient doctor I've ever seen.
